H0.text: what act did parliament pass after the boston tea party. Coercive Acts

H1.text: what act did parliament pass after the boston tea party. Boston Port Act

H2.text: what act did parliament pass after the boston tea party. Colonial Restriction Acts

H3.text: what act did parliament pass after the boston tea party. Intolerable Acts

A4.text: The Intolerable Acts were a series of five punitive laws passed by the British Parliament in 1774 after the Boston Tea Party.

A5.text: The Boston Port Act was the first of the laws passed in 1774 in response to the Boston Tea Party.

A6.text: The primary documents include the text of the Boston Port Act, Massachusetts Government Act, Administration of Justice Act, and Quartering Act.
